Job Responsibilities


Independently analyse and process routine transactional or low-value tactical purchase requisition
Work with internal clients on formulation of material / services specification and provision of advice on purchasing strategy and selection criteria
Assist internal clients in evaluation and selection of suppliers
Ensure that related documentation complies with approved policies and standards
Handles internal clients' queries
Responsible for organization and planning of simple projects responsively and systematically within a defined framework and timeline
Support corporate procurement initiatives

Job Requirements


Degree or relevant professional qualifications in purchasing/supply management, and / or a university graduate with major in business management.
Minimum 3 - 5 years relevant experience
Can conduct tendering preferably using SAP
Can liaise with suppliers on tendering process independently
Good communications skills
selling_points: At least 3 years full procurement experience
